TopicTitle: I think I might have discovered nuclear fission at a larger scale.

Articles.Content: Everyone knows that stupid glitch that when you have serious and I mean serious clipping and you reload the craft it explodes and sends the debris flying. I knew the glitch but I did not know that a clipped decoupler will trigger the explosion. I found this out when I was testing my mobile base for other planets on kerbin I opened a service bay and the doors went into a clipped pod and the thing asploded instantly. I was curious so I stuffed a service bay with Monopropellant tanks and the thing sent debris everywhere. Then I laid a couple of them down near each other and they blew up. post thoughts.

A) i know that Arvin (Zamonivar) have created a Tank mine out of that - when it gets over it you press space and it explodes sending the tank(MBTs 25-30 mT) into the air up to 10 meters.

Pictures or even better videos please colour me interested
I thought of that. Pics will come after more experiments
